text: The 1953 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 20th edition of the women's singles championship. Angelica Rozeanu defeated Gizi Farkas in the final by three sets to one, to win a fourth consecutive title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1953 in women's table tennis
title: 1953 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
